Publisher: Pierre Mariette le fils (French, Paris 1634–1716 Paris)
Heilbrunn Timeline of Art History: French Decorative Arts during the Reign of Louis XIV (1654–1715)
Description: This print is bound in Volume I of Oeuvres.  Jombert published his collection of Le Pautre in 1751. Volume I contains "desseins... pour la décoration des maisons, etouches, edifices;."  This print is part of a series of six plates depicting paneling in the Roman style.  This series was published by Jean Le Pautre, by Jean I Leblond, by Pierre II Mariette in 1661, and by Jombert in 1751.
